game_description: TRASH GUN Welcome to the Space Sanitation Department - Trash Gun division! Trash Gun is a virtual reality fast paced, dual wield arcade shooter that challenges players to use their quick trigger fingers and sharp brain to get the highest score possible blowing up large debris. You are an employee of the Trash Gun Division! Armed with your Trash Guns, you must quickly and efficiently destroy the large debris that is hurtling toward you. You must quickly identify your target, select the proper color laser, take aim and BOOM! Stay aware of your guns and the lasers they are firing. It is easy to get over taken if you don't stay sharp. So clock in for your shift and start shooting!!
review_1: For a simple game I gotta it was a lot of fun lol.
review_2: Trash gun is the best game ever! I played for hours trying to top my high score. Overall this game is amazing!
review_3: Grabbed this one to kill some time. The mechanics are pretty fun and challenging. Tested my brains ability to multitask and change colors. Perfectly named as the gun IS trash, but the rest of the game is a good way to kill some time with a unique game mechanic. Recommended.
review_4: This game is a lot of fun. Easy to learn and hard to master. The core mechanic of frantically switching the color of your lasers to match the trash is super fun and keeps your fingers frantically trying to keep up with your brain. Great game!
